course_title: The Oxford Soul Collective Popular Music Ensemble
course_description:
This course approaches the study of African American history and culture through culturally-informed musical performance. Centered within the African American popular music traditions of Soul, Funk, and R&B, The Oxford Soul Collective provides a unique learning experience and an opportunity to tell the compelling story of African Americans through music.
Students with previous vocal or experience on the following instruments are encouraged to audition (Piano, Electric Bass, Electric Guitar, Drum Set, Auxiliary Percussion, Saxophone, Trumpet, or Trombone). Other instruments will be considered.
